title: Science Teaching Competency Enhancement Program Applying the UDL Framework

context.prior_knowledge: Core Science Subject Knowledge and Over Two Years of Teaching Experience
context.additional_context: Practice-centered education using VR simulations in a BYOD environment, with learning outcomes measured through project-based assessment

learning_goals: Learners can apply the three principles of the UDL framework (Representation, Action & Expression, Engagement) to science lessons.
Learners can implement at least three lesson designs that consider diverse learner needs using VR simulations.
Learners can develop at least one project-based assessment tool based on peer feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
